title: Reddit
cleaned_text: [r/medicine](/r/medicine/) r/medicine is a virtual lounge for physicians and other medical professionals from around the world to talk about the latest advances, controversies, ask questions of each other, have a laugh, or share a difficult moment. This is a highly moderated subreddit. Please read the rules carefully before posting or commenting. It's a hot buzzword around here. To me it's just selling vitamin infusions and your own branded supplements for .... CASH$$$ What's troubling to me is how it's creeping into academic centers.
